channel.title: Making yourself admin
channel.description:
I have been looking through tuts and this section and alot of ppl don't know how to make themselves admin/mod, so here it is.
Purpose: To teach people how to make themselves admin/mod.
Difficulty: 1/10.
Assumed Knowledge: really simple.. Just searching and c&p
Server Base: Any
Classes Modified: client.java and maybe character folder
1.) Go to client.java and look for
[code]start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin /*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 playerRights = 3;*/[/code]
under that you should see
[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase ("someone's name")) { playerRights = 3; }[/code] Just change where it says someone's name. Next, I have to do this in my server in order to make me a owner but idk if it's like that in your's too usually you just do this and you are admin, but if not open up your character folder and click on your characters file, you should see something like this
[code][CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3486 character-posy = 3291 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 74.174.153.133 character-lastlogin = 20070610 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 186[/code]
where it says character-rights = 0, just chage that to character-rights = 3, and save, compile and run. You should now be admin.

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @ebaums_world ebaums world
item.description:
@ebaums_world wrote:

It is basically the same thing, Hidden Admin / Mod / Owner. Its no big deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

4 = hidden ownner not mod…

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @ebaums_world ebaums world
item.description:
@ebaums_world wrote:

Rofl.

  1. Wrong Section
  2. Why would you EVER do it this way?

For an easier way, go to the file labeled “Characters” and click on the user.
For example, Ebaums.txt, and you should see PlayerRights = (Number Here)

0 = Player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner
4 = Hidden Mod

Read full topic

item.title: Making yourself admin
item.dc:creator: @wazzupppl wazzupppl
item.description:
@wazzupppl wrote:

lol its way easier to go to char files and put player rights to 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner…

Read full topic

Or the simple way go into the char files and make it admin…

Read full topic

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3486 character-posy = 3291 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 74.174.153.133 character-lastlogin = 20070610 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 186

where it says character-rights = 0, just chage that to character-rights = 3, and save, compile and run. You should now be admin.
